# Basic Markdown Elements Test

## Headings

# H1 Heading
## H2 Heading
### H3 Heading
#### H4 Heading
##### H5 Heading
###### H6 Heading

## Text Formatting

This is **bold text** and this is *italic text*.

This is ***bold and italic*** text.

This is ~~strikethrough~~ text.

This is `inline code` in a sentence.

## Links

This is a [link to Google](https://www.google.com).

This is a [link to GitHub](https://github.com).

Visit [Rust documentation](https://doc.rust-lang.org/) for more info.

## Paragraphs

This is a normal paragraph with some text. It should wrap properly when the terminal width is limited.

This is another paragraph. Multiple paragraphs should be separated by blank lines.

## Mixed Formatting

You can combine **bold** and *italic* and `code` in the same sentence.

Here's a sentence with **bold text containing `inline code`** inside.

## Edge Cases

Empty bold: ****

Empty italic: **

Empty code: ``

Single character: **a**

Very long word: supercalifragilisticexpialidocious

Very long URL: [Long URL](https://www.example.com/very/long/path/that/goes/on/and/on/and/on/and/on)
